Detailed Description

Connection to SQL for disturbance information.

Company information will be added in the future. Some kind of update function is needed to make sure that the periodical disturbances' times are not totaly out of date. Otherwise the restart will take time.

Adds a number of trafficdisturbances from a vector to the database.

Parameters:

firstPacket True if it's the first disturbances that is sent with this situationID.
Returns:
True if the adding was okey, otherwise false.

bool InfoSQL::deleteDisturbances (  DisturbanceElement::DisturbanceID  disturbanceID,
const MC2String &  situationReference,
const MC2String &  supplier,
bool  removeAll,
vector< MC2String > &  toBeKept
) 
 

Removes the disturbances with a situationID and elementID.

Parameters:
disturbanceID The disturbance ID.
situationReference The situationReference string.
supplier A string identifying a supplier.
removeAll Whether all disturbances from the supplier should be removed.
toBeKept A list of situationReference strings specifying which disturbances should not be removed if removeAll is set.
Returns:
True if the delete was OK, otherwise false.

void InfoSQL::extractDisturbances (  SQLQuery &  sqlQuery,
map< uint32, DisturbanceElement * > &  disturbances
)  [private]
 

Extract the first DisturbanceElement from a SQL answer.

Parameters:
sqlQuery A SQL query already containing the answer. When the function returns it will have advanced to the first line that does not belong with the disturbance.
disturbances Output parameter for the extracted disturbances.

DisturbanceElement* InfoSQL::getDisturbance (  DisturbanceElement::DisturbanceID  disturbanceID,
const MC2String &  situationReference
)  [private]
 

Get the disturbance with the given situationReference and disturbanceID.

If disturbanceID is equal to MAX_UINT32 it is not considered. If situationReference is equal to the empty string it is not considered.

Returns:
The found disturbance or NULL if not found.

DisturbanceElement* InfoSQL::getDisturbance (  const MC2String &  situationReference  ) 
 

Get the disturbance with the given situationReference.

The found disturbance or NULL if not found.

void InfoSQL::getDisturbancesForSupplier (  vector< DisturbanceElement * > &  distVect,
const MC2String &  supplier,
const vector< MC2String > &  toBeKept
) 
 

Returns all disturbances from a specified supplier, except certain specified disturbances.

Parameters:
distVect Output parameter. The found disturbances are push_back:ed into the vector.
supplier The string identifying the supplier.
toBeKept A list of situationReference strings identifying situations that should not be inserted into distVect.

Updates the disturbances with a situationID and a elementID.

Parameters:
type The new disturbance type.
severity The new severity.
startTime The new disturbance start time.
endTime The new disturbance end time.
creationTime The time of the update, the new creation time.
comment The new disturbance comment.
situationID The situationID of the updated disturbance.
elementID The elementID of the updated disturbance.
Returns:
True if the updating was okey, otherwise false.
